title: Mango and red pepper salsa
ingredients: ['1 mango - peeled and finely chopped', '1/2 red pepper, finely chopped', '1 red chilli pepper, seeded and finely chopped', '1 or 2 spring onions, finely sliced', '1 lime, zested and juiced', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste']
